```{r libraries, results= "hide", message=F, warning=F, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggmap)
library(leaps)
library(GGally)
library(gridExtra)
```

```{r}
data <- day_data; x <- a;
shape_plot <- function(data, x){
  x <- x[[i]]
  
  print(data %>%
    ggplot() +
    geom_point(aes_string(x = x[1], y = x[2])))
}

a <- list(c("apisAb", "wildAbF"), c("region", "solitaryAbF"))
for(i in 1: length(a)){
  shape_plot(day_data, a)
}

```
